text: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life. With confidence, you have won even before you have started.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: Progress is the attraction that moves humanity.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: Chance has never yet satisfied the hope of a suffering people.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: What you do to-day that is worthwhile, inspires others to act at some future time.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: A reading man and woman is a ready man and woman, but a writing man and woman is exact.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: Hungry men have no respect for law, authority or human life.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: Africa has become the big game of the nation hunters. Today, Africa looms as the greatest commercial, industrial and political prize in the world.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: If you haven't confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life. With confidence, you have won even before you have started.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: The black skin is not a badge of shame, but rather a glorious symbol of national greatness.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: A man's bread and butter is only insured when he works for it.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: There is no force like success, and that is why the individual makes all effort to surround himself throughout life with the evidence of it ; as of the individual so should it be of the nation.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: The ends you serve that are selfish will take you no further than yourself but the ends you serve that are for all, in common, will take you into eternity.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: God made us in his own image, and he had some purpose when he thus created us; then why should we seek to destroy our identity?
author: Marcus Garvey

text: To spiritually regulate oneself is another form of the higher education that fits man for a nobler place in life.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: Take advantage of every opportunity; where there is none, make it for yourself.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: Do what is required of you and remain a slave. Do more than is required and become free.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: With confidence, you have won even before you have started.
author: Marcus Garvey

text: Up you mighty race, you can accomplish what you will.
author: Marcus Garvey
